item.title: Object & Interface problem
item.dc:creator: @Pure_Demons Pure Demons
item.description:
@Pure_Demons wrote:

[quote=“C4ll3r, post:1, topic:324814”]I want to have that if i click on a object the interface comes up,

ClickOnObject.java:11: cannot find symbol symbol : method homemap() location: class ClickOnObject homemap(); ^ 1 error Finished Building Class Files..! Druk op een toets om door te gaan. . .
I have this in my Clickonobject.class:

if (objectID == 11698) { homemap(); } //break;
And this as method in client.class:

[code]public void homemap() { //homemap
String[] s =
{
“Normal Player”, “@blu@Moderator”, “@yel@Administrator”,

“@grn@Owner”, “@red@$Donator$”
};
sendQuest(“Barrows”, 10361);

	sendQuest("Mo'brain", 10362);
	showInterface(10356);
	flushOutStream();
	}

[/code][/quote]

@Errors: homemap isn’t declared.

In Delta/DDS Speced bases the “if (objectID == ####)” is in Client.java, just search “if (objectID” and add that with it.

I think this is correct.

		if (objectID == 11698)
		{
		homemap();
		}

Take that out of Clickonobject.java, and paste with the other “if (objectID” things in Client.java. It couldn’t find it cause it wasn’t in the same class, I’m new at coding so don’t expect me to be to smart.

Read full topic

And this as method in client.class:
